trans-unit.source: Specifies how an image is positioned within a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a forma como uma imagem está posicionada dentro de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize os membros desta enumeração para definir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"></xref> is sized equal to the size of the image that it contains.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"> </xref> é um tamanho igual ao tamanho da imagem que contém.

trans-unit.source: The image is displayed in the center if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"></xref> is larger than the image.
trans-unit.target: A imagem é apresentada no Centro de se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"> </xref> é maior do que a imagem.

trans-unit.source: If the image is larger than the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"></xref>, the picture is placed in the center of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"></xref> and the outside edges are clipped.
trans-unit.target: Se a imagem é maior do que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"> </xref>, a imagem é colocada no centro do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"> </xref> e margens exteriores estão anexadas.

trans-unit.source: The image is placed in the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A imagem é colocada no canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The image is clipped if it is larger than the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"></xref> it is contained in.
trans-unit.target: A imagem está anexada se é maior do que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"> </xref> faz.

trans-unit.source: The image within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"></xref> is stretched or shrunk to fit the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A imagem dentro de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"> </xref> stretched (ampliada) ou encolhido para ajustar o tamanho do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The size of the image is increased or decreased maintaining the size ratio.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da imagem é aumentado ou diminuído manter o rácio de tamanho.
